name: This is not the END (Gla_ment)
description:
This is my third time to join Brackey's GameJam

This game concept is a lone survivor got power in a world of zombie apocalypse,

his power  is can revive everytime and can get stronger everytime he revives,

so he made a oath to god that he will use this power to wipe out all the zombies in the world.

please leave any comments for the game, so that I can improve in the future

Thank you
